name: guitar-lyrics
description: This repository contains a template for Laravel developers who want to use CodeIgniter 4 as their backend framework. It provides a seamless integration of Laravel-like features into CodeIgniter, allowing developers to leverage the strengths of both frameworks. This template provides a starting point for developers who want to leverage the power of both frameworks while maintaining a consistent development experience. Syntax is similar to Laravel, making it easy for developers to switch between frameworks.
